You slowly open your eyes to the sight of a brown raccoon, staring at you weirdly. You blink a couple of times, to make sure you're really not dreaming.

"Excuse me?" the brown raccoon snapped his fingers quite loudly, "Can you hear me?"

"Yeah, I can hear you alright," you hastily respond, as you get up from the grassy floor, "And I don't need your help."

You started to walk away from where you were sitting but he starts to follow you as a result, "C'mon, are you sure? I can show you around the place, I can take you to the toilets, I can even..."

At this point, you realized how desperate he is at helping you and you were growing a bit suspicious.

"Why exactly do you want to help me so bad?"

The raccoon froze in his tracks, trying to come up with a probable reason. At this point, you start to notice a name-tag on the animal's body, reading the word "Rigby". He must work here.

You turn to face him, looking directly into his eyes, "Rigby, do you work here?"

"U-uh... no," Rigby lies unconvincingly, "I just really want to help people out!"

Rigby flashed a fake smile, hoping you would buy it. Unfortunately for him, you're not a gullible person and you see straight through him.

"Okay, fine!" Rigby loses it, "I made a bet with my friend Mordecai to see who can get a compliment from one of the feedback forms first."

You sigh, feeling sorry for him to a certain degree. You remember the time in primary school where you made a friendly charity.

You think for a few moments, pondering on what to do. While you think, you make your way over to one of the nearby wooden benches, a few metres away from the main footpath. You and Rigby proceed to sit down on the bench. After turning your head around, making sure no-one else but Rigby is around, you start to talk to Rigby.

"Can you keep a secret Rigby?"

"Totally dude," Rigby nodded, with a smile filled with enthusiasm on her face, "Anything for someone I can help!"

"No need to oversell Rigby," you warn sternly, "I know you're only doing this for a bet."

1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.title: Teen Titans

choices: Taste this! (Beast Boy farts on you)
1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.content:
You wake up and the first thing that hits you is the stench: it’s overwhelmingly strong, like a mix of smelly feet, burritos, and farts. You look around, and the visuals only add to your disgust: the floor on which you’re laying is covered in dirty, musty laundry and remnants of food. You see socks and underwear that you assume had once been white are now an alarming cloudy yellow, hanging over the bed and the various other surfaces of the room. To your left, you spy a greasy pizza box with just a few slices left. The sweaty sock odor mixing with the half eaten pizza makes your nose burn and your stomach convulse.

How did you get here? Then you remember: the Teen Titans. You would have easily robbed that bank had it not been for the quintet of super-powered teens and their dedication to “justice,” whatever that means. Though you’re similar in age, your life has taken a much different path: as a super-intelligent hacker you’ve busted your way through security at the most heavily-guarded banks and reaped millions. Now, however, you seem to have been bested.

But why am I in…a bedroom? you think, as you look around the area. At least, you believe it’s a bedroom, though with the condition it’s in it seems more fitting for a wild animal than a human.

Just then, you hear a loud, earth-shattering belch from behind you. Startled, you turn around to see a mischievously grinning green teen, holding a soda and a burrito.

“Hey there” he says, beaming. “Glad to see you’re up!”

You recognize him instantly as the purple spandex-clad kid who helped capture you. As he stares down at you with his dumb grin, your anger builds.

“Who are you?! Where am I?! Let me out of here this instant or I’ll—

Before you can fully stand up, the teen forces his foot down on your chest, pinning you back to the smelly laundry-filled floor.

“I’m Beast Boy” he says, still grinning. “And you’re not going anywhere. Criminals like you need to be taught a lesson. And after all, I’ve always wanted a slave,” he laughs.

“I’ll never be your slave!!” you yell.

“Oh, I think you will once you get a load of this--” Beast Boy responds menacingly. “Now…”
1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.title: Trapped in Beast Boy's room

choices: Beast Boy shoves his feet in your face
Beast Boy cups his shoe over your mouth and nose (smelly mask)
1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.content:
As you lay there still pinned to the ground, Beast Boy peels off his sneakers, revealing two green feet pruning with sweat from having been in his hot shoes without any socks. The worst imaginable smell wafts through the room, and you immediately clasp your nose in terror.

“Hey, your gonna need those hands for the massaging,” yells Beast Boy. “I’m waiting!”

Reluctantly you obey, but only because the smell is so unbearable and you hope maybe if you do what he says, Beast Boy will put his stinky weapons back in his shoes and away from you.

Beast Boy sits down on his desk chair and allows you to get up in a kneeling position in order to massage his feet. Placing your hands on his soles, you begin to apply pressure in an attempt to appease your captor. It doesn’t take long for you to notice the thick coating of slimy sweat that completely covers Beast Boy’s feet, evidence that he is loathe to washing them.

“Ahhh,” he moans in pleasure as your hands become more tainted with his sticky sweat. “That’s right, massage them just like a good little slave.” He starts wiggling his toes in glee as you massage his feet, causing bits of toe-cheese to sprinkle to the floor as a result.

Just when you thought it couldn’t get any worse, Beast Boy begins eating his burrito and soda, belching loudly as he does so. The smell of his burps mixes with his feet to form a truly noxious odor. Overwhelmed, you start to lose strength, your vision fades and begin to slow down in your massaging efforts.

Beast Boy looks down at you, un-amused by your weak foot-massaging efforts.

“Looks like I’m gonna have to toughen you up,” he says with a grin
1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.title: Massaging Beast Boy's feet

1553322222222222222222222222222122222222.content:
With that, beast boy shoved his smelly feet square onto your face, with his sole resting right on your nose. You tried to breath through your mouth, but his heel covered your lips, forcing you to smell and taste his sweaty, dirty sole directly.

“Why?” you whimper, muffled under Beast Boy’s feet, tears streaming down your face as he pressed harder onto your face, his heel now pressing up against your mouth with sweat salty dripping dripping onto your tongue.

Beast Boy looked down at you, laughing. “Don’t worry dude, this is nothing. You’re lucky I actually washed my feet yesterday.”

He then applies more pressure your to your face, which is now covered in his sweat, and he starts lightly bobbing your head back and forth like you’re a soccer ball and he’s a bored teen looking for something to occupy his time. He then takes his other foot and sandwiches your face in between his two soles, creating a stinky pyramid above your nose.

“Whoa, your face makes a perfect foot rest!” Beast Boy says in delight.

You try to hold your breath under the hot cave that beast boy has made with his feet, but it’s futile. Soon, you begin to suffocate under his fumes, slowly losing your strength. As you begin to pass out, you can hear Beast Boy chuckling above you…

….

You wake up.

You don’t know what time it is or how long you were passed out. The memory of Beast Boy’s feet rushes back to you and you shudder.

‘Where am I?’ you think. Something’s not right.

Looking around, you realize…
